This guide organizes resources by source, provides direct URLs, and includes placement recommendations for a casual \"chill xả stress\" vibe.\n\n---\n\n## Asteria Mui Ne Resort: Official imagery from 816+ verified sources\n\nThe resort offers **343 rooms** across a **200m private beachfront** with Azure Pool, Sandora Restaurant, and Stellar Spa. 'opacity-100' : 'opacity-0',\n            &#96;object-${objectFit}&#96;,\n            className\n          )}\n        /&gt;\n      )}\n\n      {/* Error fallback */}\n      {hasError &amp;&amp; (\n        &lt;div className=\n}",

        "contents": "function RoomImageGallery({ roomType, roomId, isOpen, onClose }: RoomImageGalleryProps) {\n  const [currentImageIndex, setCurrentImageIndex] = useState(0);\n  const [isImageLoading, setIsImageLoading] = useState(true);\n  const [loadedImages, setLoadedImages] = useState&lt;Set&lt;number&gt;&gt;(new Set());\n  const roomImages = getRoomImages(roomType);\n\n  // Reset to first image when modal opens\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    if (isOpen) {\n      setCurrentImageIndex(0);\n      setIsImageLoading(true);\n    }\n  }, [isOpen]);\n\n  // Preload adjacent images\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    if (!isOpen) return;\n\n    const preloadIndices = [\n      currentImageIndex,\n      (currentImageIndex + 1) % roomImages.length,\n      (currentImageIndex - 1 + roomImages.length) % roomImages.length,\n    ];\n\n    preloadIndices.forEach((idx) =&gt; {\n      if (!loadedImages.has(idx)) {\n        const img = new Image();\n        img.src = roomImages[idx].src;\n        img.onload = () =&gt; {\n          setLoadedImages(prev =&gt; new Set([...prev, idx]));\n        };\n      }\n    });\n  }, [isOpen, currentImageIndex, roomImages, loadedImages]);\n\n  const handleImageLoad = useCallback(() =&gt; {\n    setIsImageLoading(false);\n    setLoadedImages(prev =&gt; new Set([...prev, currentImageIndex]));\n  }, [currentImageIndex]);\n\n  // Keyboard navigation\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    if (!isOpen) return;\n\n    const handleKeyDown = (e: KeyboardEvent) =&gt; {\n      if (e.key === 'ArrowLeft') {\n        setCurrentImageIndex((prev) =&gt; (prev - 1 + roomImages.length) % roomImages.length);\n      } else if (e.key === 'ArrowRight') {\n        setCurrentImageIndex((prev) =&gt; (prev + 1) % roomImages.length);\n      } else if (e.key === 'Escape') {\n        onClose();\n      }\n    };\n\n    window.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);\n    return () =&gt; window.removeEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);\n  }, [isOpen, roomImages.length, onClose]);\n\n  const nextImage = () =&gt;\n;\n}",

        "contents": "/**\n * Room Images Mapping\n * Maps room types to their respective images\n *\n * Note: Images are automatically optimized during build via vite-imagetools:\n * - Converted to WebP format\n * - Resized to max 1200px width\n * - Quality set to 80% for optimal balance\n *\n * Original images (~25-35MB each) are compressed to ~50-100KB\n */\n\n// Deluxe Twin Images\nimport deluxeTwin1 from '@/assets/Images/Deluxe Twin/Deluxe Twin 1.jpg';\nimport deluxeTwin2 from '@/assets/Images/Deluxe Twin/Deluxe Twin 2.jpg';\nimport deluxeTwinBathroom1 from '@/assets/Images/Deluxe Twin/Bathroom (1).jpg';\nimport deluxeTwinBathroom2 from '@/assets/Images/Deluxe Twin/Bathroom (2).jpg';\nimport deluxeTwinBalcony from '@/assets/Images/Deluxe Twin/View - Balcony (3).jpg';\nimport deluxeTwinArmchair from '@/assets/Images/Deluxe Twin/Armchair.jpg';\nimport deluxeTwinWardrobe from '@/assets/Images/Deluxe Twin/Wardrobe.jpg';\nimport deluxeTwinDesk from '@/assets/Images/Deluxe Twin/Working Desk.jpg';\n\n// Deluxe Double Images\nimport deluxeDouble1 from '@/assets/Images/Deluxe Double/Deluxe Double 1.jpg';\nimport deluxeDouble2 from '@/assets/Images/Deluxe Double/Deluxe Double 2.jpg';\nimport deluxeDouble3 from '@/assets/Images/Deluxe Double/Deluxe Double 3.jpg';\nimport deluxeDoubleGardenView from '@/assets/Images/Deluxe Double/Deluxe with garden view.jpg';\nimport deluxeDoubleBathroom from '@/assets/Images/Deluxe Double/Bathroom (2).jpg';\nimport deluxeDoubleBalcony from '@/assets/Images/Deluxe Double/View - Balcony (2).jpg';\nimport deluxeDoubleSofa from '@/assets/Images/Deluxe Double/Sofa and Balcony.jpg';\nimport deluxeDoubleDesk from '@/assets/Images/Deluxe Double/Desk - Tea &amp; Coffee.jpg';\nimport deluxeDoubleSink from '@/assets/Images/Deluxe Double/Sink.jpg';\n\nexport interface RoomImage {\n    src: string;\n    thumbnail: string;\n    alt: string;\n    category: 'main' | 'bathroom' | 'balcony' | 'amenities';\n}\n\nexport const roomImages = {\n    Twin: {\n as const;",

            "text": "/**",

          {
            "text": " * Room Images Mapping",

          {
            "text": " * Maps room types to their respective images",

        "relativeWorkspacePath": "./ngd-team-building/scripts/optimize-images.sh",
        "range": {
          "startPosition": {},
          "endPosition": {
            "line": 54

        "contents": "#!/bin/bash\n\n# Image Optimization Script for NGD Team Building 2025\n# This script optimizes images for web use:\n# - Resizes images to max 1920px width (maintaining aspect ratio)\n# - Creates WebP versions for modern browsers\n# - Creates smaller thumbnail versions (400px width)\n# - Compresses JPEG with 85% quality\n\nset -e\n\n# Colors for output\nRED='\\033[0;31m'\nGREEN='\\033[0;32m'\nYELLOW='\\033[1;33m'\nNC='\\033[0m' # No Color\n\n# Configuration\nMAX_WIDTH=1920\nTHUMB_WIDTH=400\nJPEG_QUALITY=85\nWEBP_QUALITY=85\n\n# Source and output directories\nSRC_DIR=\"src/assets/Images\"\nOUTPUT_DIR=\"src/assets/Images-optimized\"\n\necho -e \"${YELLOW}🖼️  NGD Team Building - Image Optimization Script${NC}\"\necho \"==================================================\"\n\n# Check if ImageMagick is installed\nif ! command -v convert &amp;&gt; /dev/null; then\n    echo -e \"${RED}❌ ImageMagick is not installed.${NC}\"\n    echo \"Please install it using: brew install imagemagick\"\n    exit 1\nfi\n\n# Check if cwebp is installed (for WebP conversion)\nif ! command -v cwebp &amp;&gt; /dev/null; then\n    echo -e \"${YELLOW}⚠️  cwebp not found. Installing via Homebrew...${NC}\"\n    brew install webp\nfi\n\n# Create output directory structure\necho -e \"\\n${GREEN}📁 Creating output directories...${NC}\"\nmkdir -p \"$OUTPUT_DIR/Deluxe Twin\"\nmkdir -p \"$OUTPUT_DIR/Deluxe Double\"\nmkdir -p \"$OUTPUT_DIR/thumbnails/Deluxe Twin\"\nmkdir -p \"$OUTPUT_DIR/thumbnails/Deluxe Double\"\n\n# Function to optimize a single image\noptimize_image() {\n    local src_file=\"$1\"\n    local output_base=\"$2\"",
        "signatures": {},
        "detailedLines": [
          {
            "text": "#!/bin/bash",
            "lineNumber": 1
          },
          {
            "lineNumber": 2
          },
          {
            "text": "# Image Optimization Script for NGD Team Building 2025",
            "lineNumber": 3

            "text": "# This script optimizes images for web use:",

          },
          {
            "text": "# - Resizes images to max 1920px width (maintaining aspect ratio)",
            "lineNumber": 5
          },
          {
            "text": "# - Creates WebP versions for modern browsers",
            "lineNumber": 6
          },
          {
            "text": "# - Creates smaller thumbnail versions (400px width)",
            "lineNumber": 7
          },
          {
            "text": "# - Compresses JPEG with 85% quality",
            "lineNumber": 8
          },
          {
            "lineNumber": 9
          },
          {
            "text": "set -e",

          },
          {
            "lineNumber": 11
          },

          {

          },
          {
            "lineNumber": 17
          },
          {
            "text": "# Configuration",

          },
          {
            "text": "MAX_WIDTH=1920",

          },
          {
            "text": "THUMB_WIDTH=400",
            "lineNumber": 20
          },
          {
            "text": "JPEG_QUALITY=85",

          },

          },
          {

          },
          {

          {

          },
          {

          },
          {
            "text": "echo -e \"${YELLOW}🖼️  NGD Team Building - Image Optimization Script${NC}\"",

          },
          {
            "text": "echo \"==================================================\"",

          },
          {
            "lineNumber": 30
          },

          {

        "contents": "# Function to optimize a single image\noptimize_image() {\n    local src_file=\"$1\"\n    local output_base=\"$2\"\n    local filename=$(basename \"$src_file\")\n    local name=\"${filename%.*}\"\n\n    echo -e \"  Processing: ${YELLOW}$filename${NC}\"\n\n    # Create optimized JPEG (full size)\n    convert \"$src_file\" \\\n        -resize \"${MAX_WIDTH}x&gt;\" \\\n        -quality $JPEG_QUALITY \\\n        -strip \\\n        -interlace Plane \\\n        \"${output_base}/${name}.jpg\"\n\n    # Create WebP version (full size)\n    cwebp -q $WEBP_QUALITY \"${output_base}/${name}.jpg\" -o \"${output_base}/${name}.webp\" 2&gt;/dev/null\n\n    # Create thumbnail JPEG\n    convert \"$src_file\" \\\n        -resize \"${THUMB_WIDTH}x&gt;\" \\\n        -quality 80 \\\n        -strip \\\n        \"${output_base}/../thumbnails/$(dirname \"${output_base##*/}\")/${name}-thumb.jpg\"\n\n    # Create thumbnail WebP\n    cwebp -q 80 \"${output_base}/../thumbnails/$(dirname \"${output_base##*/}\")/${name}-thumb.jpg\" \\\n        -o \"${output_base}/../thumbnails/$(dirname \"${output_base##*/}\")/${name}-thumb.webp\" 2&gt;/dev/null\n\n    # Show size comparison\n    local original_size=$(ls -la \"$src_file\" | awk '{print $5}')\n    local optimized_size=$(ls -la \"${output_base}/${name}.jpg\" | awk '{print $5}')\n    local webp_size=$(ls -la \"${output_base}/${name}.webp\" | awk '{print $5}')\n\n    local original_mb=$(echo \"scale=2; $original_size / 1048576\" | bc)\n    local optimized_kb=$(echo \"scale=0; $optimized_size / 1024\" | bc)\n    local webp_kb=$(echo \"scale=0; $webp_size / 1024\" | bc)\n\n    echo -e \"    Original: ${RED}${original_mb}MB${NC} → JPEG: ${GREEN}${optimized_kb}KB${NC} → WebP: ${GREEN}${webp_kb}KB${NC}\"\n}\n\n# Process Deluxe Twin images\necho -e \"\\n${GREEN}🛏️  Processing Deluxe Twin images...${NC}\"\nfor img in \"$SRC_DIR/Deluxe Twin\"/*.jpg; do\n    if [ -f \"$img\" ]; then\n        optimize_image \"$img\" \"$OUTPUT_DIR/Deluxe Twin\"\n    fi\ndone\n\n# Process Deluxe Double images\necho -e \"\\n${GREEN}🛏️  Processing Deluxe Double images...${NC}\"\nfor img in \"$SRC_DIR/Deluxe Double\"/*.jpg; do\n    if [ -f \"$img\" ]; then\n        optimize_image \"$img\" \"$OUTPUT_DIR/Deluxe Double\"",
